what we do
    Bingo
    (Adults Only)
    Get active with the community elders through a game of Bingo! Boxes, Crazy 8's, Shotgun and Speed Bingo!
    Click for more info
    Clay
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Dancing
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Hip-Hop, Modern, Ballet   Baltimore Club Dance starting early 2018.
    Click for more info
    Digital Lab
    (All Ages)
    Our computer lab is open to the public during select hours.
    Click for more info
    Drumming
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    African Drum Lessons every Wednesday.
    Click for more info
    GW Podcast
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info

    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Noisy Ventures
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about financial literacy + education, and create + operate micro-businesses.
    Click for more info
    Photography
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about photography and film as a medium for communal storytelling.
    Click for more info
    Robotics
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn concepts about S.T.E.A.M through planning and building robots using LEGO® bricks.
    Click for more info

Greenmount West Community Center is a community art space that’s free to the public.
Greenmount West Community Center is centrally located in Baltimore, MD — providing resources + programming to the community’s residents. Volunteer today!
Hours of Operation
Office Hours
Monday, Wednesday, Thursday 10 AM - 1 PM
Program Hours
Monday, Tuesday, Thursday 3 PM - 6 PM Wednesday, 10 AM - 6 PM Saturday 10 AM - 1 PM
Location
1600 Guilford Avenue Baltimore, MD 21202
Play
Discover GWCC Free + Open to Public
Programming for youth and seniors, while serving as a resource hub for all of the Greenmount West initiatives (Workforce development, AHC and GED)
Learn More
Employing Youth Workers Ages 14 +
Youth from the Greenmount West community, either living in or going to school in, are welcome to apply!
Let's Connect

Baltimore, MD 21202
